introduction: Founder of Cultivating Wholeness, a network-based global coaching and advisory firm, Sarah is a PCC ICF certified Executive Coach and acts as a catalyst for personal, cultural and organizational transformation. She supports leaders of purpose-led start-ups or organisations to bring forth a profound shift in their strategy through regenerative principles and empower them to role model the behaviors driven by their values and purpose. Enabling their business to be a life-affirming positive force in stewarding our planet on a regenerative path.

sustainability_journey: Since I can recall, I have always had a curiosity and deep connection with nature. From playing in the mud as a kid, to being filled with joy, energized and nourished walking through an old growth forest. It's been an important teacher that motivated my research during my master's in fossil fuel divestment at the Conference of Parties back in 2014 in Peru. As well as an essential tool throughout my career to radically improve organisational resilience, dynamics and performance by integrating natures structures or decision-making models best adapted to complex and volatile environments.

challenges_overcome.resistance_to_change: With change comes resistance. In 10 years of experience coaching leadership & consulting for enterprises & cultural transformation, I've seen different types of resistance across multiple organizations through various industries

first_challenge.issue: WHY! When people don't get the why, how it will impact their daily work life
first_challenge.impact: Does not put them in state where they are Able Ready and especially Willing to invest time and energy
first_challenge.solution: Starting with WHY that speaks to everyone, not just certain stakeholders

second_challenge.issue: Immunity to Change - can arise through personal development, with protective parts or limiting beliefs
second_challenge.scope: Applies to personal development, organisations, even societies with common narratives and beliefs that no longer serve context
second_challenge.solution: Combine WHY with co-creative and collaborative approach integrated at all levels, key actors from top to bottom

change_management_approach: Co-creative and collaborative approach drives momentum, generates engagement, diminishes friction. Creates space for conversation, challenge to face collective limiting beliefs and immunities as you integrate change and lead by example.
proudest_achievement: Everytime I see the spark of life, possibility and insight in the eyes of a client. When I receive a testimonial from my clients on how I've changed or impacted positively their life, their work, their relationship with their partners or kids. It makes it all worthwhile! Being the change I want to see in the world especially when I took the leap to start my own business, leading with courage, being integral to my purpose, values. Ultimately being part of creating a future I know is possible with the dawn of the regenerative era.
